instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00164 green light, fan spin, no chime, no image, no boot
threads.message:
When connecting charger fan spins for about 7 secs then stops, the starts again and after a while  it goes again (sometimes full throttle even with everything connected). No image, no chime, no caps lock light. 

On SMC bypass fan goes normal for about 2 secs, then instantly full throttle. No image, no chime, no caps lock light. 
 

PPBUS_G3H: 8.5 v

PP3V42_G3H: 3.4v

PP5V_S5: 5.14v

PP5V_S0: 5.0v

PP3V3_S5: 3.3v

PP3V3_S4: 3.3v

PP3V3_SUS: 3.3v

PP3V3_S3: 3.3v

PP3V3_S0: 3.3v

PP1V8_S3: 1.8v

PP1V2_S3: 1.2v

PPVCC_S0_CPU: 1.8v

Do you happen to have a clean BIOS for this board? Thanks

threads.title: 820-00164 green light, fan spin, no chime, no image, no boot
820-00164 green light, fan spin, no chime, no image, no boot
threads.message:
Yes, PLT_RESET_L is 3.3v

Changed BIOS chip no change.
